regen.absent_element: the complete definition of necessary information in functional identity
regen.new_specification: The functional identity shall include any additional information necessary for the call besides the train number or engine number, such as operational status or destination identifiers.

regen.absent_element: confirmation of successful call connection back to the system
regen.new_specification: Once the call is connected, the system shall confirm the successful connection back to the call controller to ensure the communication loop is complete.
No new specification required as all functions are covered without incompleteness.

label: If the system is not able to connect the call, an audible and visual indication shall be provided to the driver that the call was not received by the controller.
